targets.expr: sum(rate(http_server_requests_seconds_sum{ namespace=~"$namespace", job=~"$job", pod=~"$pod"} [2m])) by (pod) / sum(rate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{ namespace=~"$namespace", job=~"$job", pod=~"$pod"} [2m])) by (pod)

panels.description: If the CPU Usage is not shown, please check the query in the panel "CPU Usage" in the dashboard "General/Kubernetes/Compute Resources/Pod" to see whether "sum_rate" is used instead of "sum_irate".  If it is the case, please update sum_irate in Query A in this panel to sum_rate.
panels.title: CPU Usage

targets.expr: sum(increase(container_cpu_cfs_throttled_periods_total{namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", container="$container"}[5m])) by (pod) /sum(increase(container_cpu_cfs_periods_total{namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", container="$container"}[5m])) by (pod)
sum(rate(logback_events_total{ namespace=~"$namespace", job=~"$job", pod=~"$pod", level=~"error|warn"}[2m]) ) by (pod)

panels.title: Rate of Info and Trace Messages by Pod

targets.expr: (sum(rate(camel_exchange_event_notifier_seconds_sum{ namespace="$namespace", job=~"$job", pod=~"$pod"} [2m])) by (routeId,eventType,endpointName) / sum(rate(camel_exchange_event_notifier_seconds_count{namespace="$namespace", job="$job", pod=~"$pod"}[2m])) by (routeId,eventType,endpointName)) > 0

(sum(rate(camel_route_policy_seconds_sum{ namespace="$namespace", job=~"$job", pod=~"$pod", eventType="route"} [2m])) by (routeId) / sum(rate(camel_route_policy_seconds_count{ namespace="$namespace", job=~"$job", pod=~"$pod", eventType="route"} [2m])) by (routeId)) > 0

(sum(rate(camel_exchange_event_notifier_seconds_sum{ namespace="$namespace", job=~"$job", pod=~"$pod", eventType="ExchangeSentEvent", endpointName =~ "https://.*"} [2m])) by (endpointName) / sum(rate(camel_exchange_event_notifier_seconds_count{namespace="$namespace", job="$job", pod=~"$pod",eventType="ExchangeSentEvent", endpointName =~ "https://.*"}[2m])) by (endpointName)) > 0

panels.title: HTTP Outbound Calls - Average Response Time

targets.expr: sum(rate(http_server_requests_seconds_sum{ namespace="$namespace", job=~"$job", pod=~"$pod"} [2m])) / sum(rate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{ namespace="$namespace", job=~"$job", pod=~"$pod"} [2m]))

(sum(rate(camel_exchange_event_notifier_seconds_sum{ namespace="$namespace", job=~"$job", pod=~"$pod", eventType="ExchangeSentEvent", endpointName =~ "https://.*"} [2m])) / sum(rate(camel_exchange_event_notifier_seconds_count{namespace="$namespace", job="$job", pod=~"$pod",eventType="ExchangeSentEvent", endpointName =~ "https://.*"}[2m])) ) > 0

panels.title: Camel Route Exchanges - Outbound HTTP Calls

targets.expr: (sum(rate(http_server_requests_seconds_sum{ namespace="$namespace", job=~"$job", pod=~"$pod"} [2m])) by (uri,status) / sum(rate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{ namespace="$namespace", job=~"$job", pod=~"$pod"} [2m])) by (uri,status))> 0

sum(rate(spring_security_authorizations_seconds_sum{ namespace="$namespace", job="$job", pod=~"$pod"} [2m])) by (spring_security_authentication_type) / sum(rate(spring_security_authorizations_seconds_count{ namespace="$namespace", job="$job", pod=~"$pod"} [2m])) by (spring_security_authentication_type)

sum(rate(spring_security_authentications_seconds_sum{ namespace="$namespace", job="$job", pod=~"$pod"} [2m])) by (authentication_request_type) / sum(rate(spring_security_authentications_seconds_count{ namespace="$namespace", job="$job", pod=~"$pod"} [2m])) by (authentication_request_type)
